src: <hulu> nɯ si ci ɲɯ-ŋu, ɯ-mat cʰɯ-kɯ-βze ci. tɕe ɯ-mat nɯnɯ, ɯ-taʁ ku-kɯ-xtsʰɯm, ɯ-pa ɲɯ-kɯ-jpum ci cʰɯ-βze ɲɯ-ŋu tɕe, nɯ <hulu> tu-sɤrmi-nɯ.
trs: The gourd is a tree, one which grows fruits. It grows fruits that are thinner on the top part and thicker in the bottom, they are called `gourd'.' (150825 huluwa-zh, 2-3)

imtwordshtml: iter\redp{}tral-aor-drink-pst:tr-1sg
src: cʰa ɕkɯ\redp{}ɕ-kɤ-tsʰi-t-a ʑo lu-βzi-a ŋu
trs: Each time I go and drink alcohol I get drunk.' (elicited)

src: kɯki tɯrme kɯra ɕ-tɯ\redp{}tɤ-kɯ-tsʰɤt ʑo nɯ pjɤ́-wɣ-sat-nɯ.
trs: All of these men who had went and tried (to discover the princesses' secret) were killed.' (140508 shier ge tiaowu de gongzhu-zh, 33)

src: a-tɕɯ tɯ\redp{}tɯ-ŋu nɤ, pɯ-ta-sɯxɕɤt nɯ ci nɯ-ndɯn ra
trs: If you are my son, then recite (the mantra) that I have taught you.' (Norbzang 2012, 221)

src: tɯ\redp{}tɤ-tɯ-tɯt nɤ tɕe pjɯ-ta-sat ŋu
trs: If you tell (them) about (it), I will kill you.' (150901 changfamei-zh, 54)

src: tɕeri tɯ-mɤpa kɯnɤ, tɯ-xtsa mɯ\redp{}mɤ-pɯ-pe cʰondɤre,  tɤ-rʑaʁ kɯ-rɲɟi tu-kɯ-ŋke qʰe, tɯ-mɤpa ri cimbɤrom tu-rke ŋgrɤl.
trs: On the soles too, if one has had bad shoes, and walked for a long time, blisters will form on one's soles.' (27-tWfCAl, 139)

src: [kɯki tɕʰemɤpɯ ki si ɯ-kɯ-pʰɯt tɯ-tɤ-ɣe ʑo], nɯnɯ rgɤnmɯ nɯ ɣɯ ɯ-si ɲɯ-pʰɯt, ɯ-tɯ-ci z-ɲɯ-re,
trs: Every time the girl came to cut firewood, she would cut firewood for the old woman and fetch water for her.' (150829 taishan zhi zhu-zh, 33)

src: ʑɯrɯʑɤri tɕe cʰɯ\redp{}cʰɯ-mɤɕi-ndʑi nɤ cʰɯ\redp{}cʰɯ-mɤɕi-ndʑi tɕe
trs: They progressively became richer and richer.' (02-deluge2012, 132)

src: ɬɤndʐi nɯ rca, tɯ\redp{}tu-cʰa ʑo pjɤ-ɕti. tɕendɤre, ɯʑo nɯnɯ tɕe ʑɯrɯʑɤri tɕe, mɯ\redp{}mɤ-ɲɯ-cʰa ʑo pjɤ-ɕti tɕe
trs: The demon was becoming stronger and stronger, and he was weaker and weaker.' (140513 abide he mogui-zh, 81)

src: laχtɕʰa ŋotɕu nɤ-kɤ-sɯso ʑo nɯnɯ, nɤ-mɲaʁ, nɤ-rna, nɤ-ɕna cʰo ra [kɯ\redp{}kɯ-spoʁ] nɯ ɯ-ŋgɯ tɕe a-kɤ-tɯ-rke qʰe
trs: Whatever things you want (from the granary), put it in your eyes, your ears, your nose etc, all the holes in your body.' (31-deluge, 138)

src: wuma ʑo ɲɯ-pe ndɤre, [kɯ\redp{}kɤ-sɯso] nɯ ɲɯ-fse
trs: It is very nice, it is like everything that (I) want.' (2011-04-smanmi, 214)

src: tɕe ɯ-tʰɤcu prɤscʰɯ ra [tɯ\redp{}tɤ-kɯ-rɯkʰɤrlɤn] kɯ nɯ-rdɤstaʁ nɯ ntsɯ s-cʰɤ-nɯ-ru-nɯ tɕe to-nɯ-ntɕʰoz-nɯ.
trs: All people from Praskyu down there who built/repaired their houses went there and took stones to use for themselves.' (140522 Kamnyu zgo, 196)

src: ɯ-ro nɯra [iɕqʰa pɯ\redp{}pɯ-fɕat-a] nɯra kɯ tɕe tɕe sɯjno tu-ndza-nɯ
trs: The rest, all the (other animals) that I have told about just before eat grass.' (05-khWna, 46

src: nɯ [spɯ\redp{}spe] nɯ to-nɤrmi ri tɤte <zhima> kɤ-ti nɯ ɲɤ-nɯ-jmɯt
trs: He called the names of all (the crops) he knew, but forgot to say `sesame'.' (140512 alibaba-zh, 109)

src: tɤtʰo nɯ pɯpɯŋunɤ, tɕe nɯ mɤ-fse tɕe tɕendɤre ɯ-jwaʁ nɯ nɯ\redp{}nɯ-tu nɤ nɯ\redp{}nɯ-tu qʰe
trs: As for the pine, it is not like (the other trees), (whatever happens), its leaves (needles) are still there.'  (07-tAtho, 16)

src: ɯʑo nɯ-nɯ-me ɕti.
trs: (The wart) disappeared by itself.' (24-pGArtsAG, 53)

src: tɕʰeme kɯ-mpɕɯ\redp{}mpɕɤr kɯ-pɯ\redp{}pe ci nɤ-ɕɣa  kɯ-xtɕɯ\redp{}xtɕi ci a-nɯ-tɯ-ɤβzu smɯlɤm
trs: May you become a very beautiful, nice young girl.' (Norbzang 2012, 264)

src: ɯ-ku nɯra tɕe nɤki, ɯ-kɤχcɤl nɯra li ɲɯ-qarŋe qʰe ɲɯ-wɣrɯ\redp{}wɣrum kɯ-fse.
trs: It is yellow and very white on the top of its head.' (24-ZmbrWpGa, 24)

src: kɯ-rgɯ\redp{}rga ʑo tɯrme ra maŋe-nɯ ma
trs: There are no people who like it a lot.' (160706 thotsi, 24)

src: tɯ-ji sna tɕe, [tɕʰi lɤ́-wɣ-nɯ-jɯ\redp{}ji] ʑo pe
trs: (The type of earth called \forme{tɤtʂo}) is fit (to be used) as fields, whatever one plants in it, (the planting) will be good (successful).' (25-cWXCWz, 64)
